title: (x) Nissan AG - Akzidenz Grotesk Extended {Franz, Marc O}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?   
   
 ![?](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013215im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33286.gif)
author: karlozi

comments.content: Looks a lot like Akzidenz Grotesk..

Trade Gothic Bold Extended or Akzidenz Grotesk Extended will get you very close.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/testdrive.html?s=FULL-SIZE+TITAN&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013215/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/lh-bold-extended/testdrive.html?s=FULL-SIZE%2BTITAN&p=48)   
   
 [http://www.bertholdtypes.com/bq\_library/90038.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013215/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/90038.html)

Indeed, Akzidenz Grotesk Medium Extended, 30pt. If it doesn't match 100% it's probably the customised version, aptly named [Nissan AG](http://web.archive.org/web/20091005013215/http:/www.bertholdtypes.com/bq_library/nissan.html).
